amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the assignee and securitizer liability provisions from the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-98 to strike the assignee and securitizer liability provisions from the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hensarling amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 171 - 252 (Roll no. 239).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Hensarling.
